gen:link.msg:message: `AccruedIncome` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_AccruedIncome')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_AccruedIncome return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
